# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Please report security issues to [REPLACE_WITH_SECURITY_INBOX].

## Response Targets

- Initial acknowledgment: within 72 hours.
- Resolution target: within 90 days.

## Scope

This policy covers production systems and services under:

- apexbusiness-systems.com

## Coordinated Disclosure

Please do not publicly disclose vulnerabilities until we confirm remediation.
